channel.title: Runescape Pures
channel.description: I was Thinking about making a pure, Just for abit of "fun" i don't know if this is a good idea or not, I don't really want to make one alone, so i was wondering if anyone else would want to make one with me? For pk'ing And questing ect. Getting mith gloves, and all the good shit.

item.title: Runescape Pures
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:9, topic:426476”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=529171.msg3861303#msg3861303 date=1324686416]

[quote author=t4 link=topic=529171.msg3861063#msg3861063 date=1324676782]

I was Thinking about making a pure, Just for abit of “fun” i don’t know if this is a good idea or not, I don’t really want to make one alone, so i was wondering if anyone else would want to make one with me? For pk’ing And questing ect. Getting mith gloves, and all the good shit.

What type of pure? Range? Str? Mage?

I don’t think they’re defined that way
[/quote]Not anymore, now its just hybrids

Erm, that’s not what I meant. The reason why the hybrid model (for many types of pures) is because of the fact it doesn’t effect combat level.
[/quote]What did you mean?

for example, if you have an account with 99 magic/hp, it’s possible to get around 140 attack or strength levels before gaining a single combat.[/quote]
Only factor that’d change your cb would be hp in this scenario.

Its always been a waste to be one type of pure, hybrid is the way to go.

Read full topic

I was Thinking about making a pure, Just for abit of “fun” i don’t know if this is a good idea or not, I don’t really want to make one alone, so i was wondering if anyone else would want to make one with me? For pk’ing And questing ect. Getting mith gloves, and all the good shit.

What type of pure? Range? Str? Mage?

I don’t think they’re defined that way
[/quote]Not anymore, now its just hybrids

Erm, that’s not what I meant. The reason why the hybrid model (for many types of pures) is because of the fact it doesn’t effect combat level.
[/quote]What did you mean?[/quote]
for example, if you have an account with 99 magic/hp, it’s possible to get around 140 attack or strength levels before gaining a single combat.

Read full topic
